text: hi i'm sarah carey from everyday food
around here we're all about getting
delicious dinner on the table task
that's why this holiday season we're
trying to focus on helping others do the
same 50 million people struggle with
hunger every day that's why we've
launched an initiative with Crowdrise
called Martha Stewart's thanks for
giving crowd rises a platform that helps
charities and people raise money for the
causes that they care about and around
here we care about feeding people they
also host contests that challenge
charities to compete to raise the most
money for their causes in our
competition the charity that raises the
most money by November 27 its twenty
five thousand dollars for their cause
second-place 15,000 and third place
$10,000 just like it everyday food
donating with Crowdrise is really easy
just go to crab rice calm backslash
Martha Stewart and pick a charity whose
mission resonates with you check out our
Facebook and Twitter to find out more
about our awesome program and don't
forget to tell your family and friends
help us make this holiday season a
little bit brighter by donating to
Martha Stewart's thanks for giving every
dollar counts no amount is too small so
just do it people
